Test running Hook with handleHttp.

<<< handleHttp_response.json
{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "OK",
  "data": {
    "LastRun": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "NextRun": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "Interval": 0,
    "NumRunning": 0,
    "Logs": null,
    "ID": "test_hook_handle_http",
    "Name": "Test hook handle HTTP",
    "Description": "",
    "Path": "/test-hook-handle-http",
    "HeaderSign": "x-karajo-sign",
    "LastStatus": "started",
    "Commands": null,
    "LogRetention": 5
  }
}

<<< hook_after.json
{
  "LastRun": "2023-01-09T00:00:00Z",
  "NextRun": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "Interval": 0,
  "NumRunning": 0,
  "Logs": [
    {
      "HookID": "test_hook_handle_http",
      "Name": "test_hook_handle_http.1.success",
      "Status": "success",
      "Counter": 1,
      "Content": "T3V0cHV0IGZyb20gQ2FsbA=="
    }
  ],
  "ID": "test_hook_handle_http",
  "Name": "Test hook handle HTTP",
  "Description": "",
  "Path": "/test-hook-handle-http",
  "HeaderSign": "x-karajo-sign",
  "LastStatus": "success",
  "Commands": null,
  "LogRetention": 5
}
